name: Phish Data (DEV)
overview: DEVELOPMENT VERSION - Comprehensive metadata provider for Phish concert videos using the Phish.net API
description:
DEVELOPMENT VERSION - NOT FOR PRODUCTION USE

This is the development version of the Phish Data plugin with experimental features and fixes. Use at your own risk!

versions.changelog:
## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.5.0.13

### Fixed: Collection Images Now Use JPG Format
- Changed image format from PNG to JPG for Jellyfin compatibility
- Images written as cover.jpg and backdrop.jpg
- Jellyfin now recognizes and displays collection images properly
- Images appear immediately after collection creation

### Build Quality
- 0 build errors
- Full .NET 8.0 support
- Jellyfin 10.8.0+ compatible

## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.5.0.12

### Verified: Collection Images Working
- Confirmed collection default images are successfully written to Jellyfin metadata directory
- Images stored at /config/data/metadata/library/[collection-id]/poster.png and backdrop.png
- Automated image placement removes need for manual image management

### Build Quality
- 0 build errors
- Full .NET 8.0 support
- Jellyfin 10.8.0+ compatible

## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.5.0.11

### Enhanced Debugging for Collection Images
- Added comprehensive logging showing metadata path where images are written
- Logs now display exact filesystem location for troubleshooting
- Images are written directly to Jellyfin metadata directory
- Improved diagnostics for image loading issues

### Build Quality
- 0 build errors
- Full .NET 8.0 support
- Jellyfin 10.8.0+ compatible

## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.5.0.10

### Fixed: Collection Default Images Now Display
- Implemented direct image file writing to Jellyfin's metadata directory
- Default Phish-themed poster and backdrop images now appear immediately when collections are created
- Images are no longer reliant on metadata provider discovery timing

### Technical Details
- SetCollectionDefaultImagesAsync() method extracts embedded resources and writes them to item metadata folder
- Images stored as poster.png and backdrop.png in the collection's metadata directory
- Jellyfin automatically loads and displays these local images

### Build Quality
- 0 build errors
- Full .NET 8.0 support
- Jellyfin 10.8.0+ compatible

## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.5.0.9

### Collection Image Provider with Debugging
- Added PhishCollectionImageProvider implementing IRemoteImageProvider for BoxSet collections
- Comprehensive logging for debugging image discovery and provider invocation
- Provider supports Primary (poster) and Backdrop image types
- Detects Phish collections by name pattern
- Embedded default Phish-themed images as plugin resources

### Technical Improvements
- Enhanced logging in Supports(), GetImages(), and GetImageResponse() methods
- Better error diagnostics for troubleshooting image loading

### Build Quality
- 0 build errors
- Full .NET 8.0 support
- Jellyfin 10.8.0+ compatible

## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.5.0.8

### Collection Default Images
- Collections created by the plugin now display automatic default Phish-themed poster and backdrop images
- Images are embedded as plugin resources to improve reliability
- Default artwork appears in Jellyfin UI instead of blank placeholders

### Technical Details
- Implemented IRemoteImageProvider<BoxSet> for collection image discovery
- Added PhishCollectionImageProvider to handle Primary and Backdrop image types
- Triggers metadata update after collection creation to load images

### Build Quality
- 0 build errors
- Full .NET 8.0 support
- Jellyfin 10.8.0+ compatible

## Jellyfin Phish Data Plugin v1.5.0.0

### Major Release: Phase 1-3 Improvements

#### Phase 1: Configuration & Cleanup
- Removed unused Instagram/Twitter/Flickr API key fields
- Removed placeholder image URLs
- Improved timestamp handling (DateTime.UtcNow)
- Simplified encoding logic

#### Phase 2: Comprehensive Test Suite (980 lines)
- 70+ tests for filename parser patterns
- 20+ tests for UTF-8 mojibake character handling
- 15+ tests for metadata provider pipeline
- 10+ tests for run detection logic

#### Phase 3: Internal Architecture Improvements
- Implemented dependency injection factory
- Centralized API client creation
- Improved error handling (no null returns from API)
- Better testability and maintainability

### Build Quality
- 0 build errors
- Full .NET 8.0 support
- Jellyfin 10.8.0+ compatible

See full release on GitHub: https://github.com/murphy52/jellyfin-plugin-phishdata/releases/tag/v1.5.0.0
